items.text: back of a length on leg stump, and spinning further down leg. He sticks his bat out, and flicks this off his pads to short fine leg
items.shortText: Shoaib Malik to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.preText: max: "am i the only person who wants a pakistan win in this match so i can take leave from office to watch india vs pak match?? " -- Definitely not the only one. And did you know, India and Pakistan have never played in an Asia Cup final.
items.text: good length on middle, and he opens his stance, and paddles this right over the keeper's left to short fine leg. Innovative once again
items.shortText: Shoaib Malik to Mohammad Mithun, 2 runs

items.text: flat on middle stump, and that's been easily clipped off his hips to deep square leg for a walking single
items.postText: UZ: "Given Junaid's tendency to leak runs at the end, and Pakistan's need to break this partnership, I'm surprised he's not back yet."
items.shortText: Shoaib Malik to Mohammad Mithun, 1 run

items.text: tossed up on off stump, and he drives through the ball's line to long on. Not off the bat's middle, but enough behind that shot to take it down the ground
items.postText: Sarfraz has a chat with Shadab.
items.shortText: Shadab Khan to Mohammad Mithun, 1 run

items.text: tossed up right on off stump, and the ball's turning in. Defended off the front foot
items.shortText: Shadab Khan to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: tossed up on leg stump, and he converts this into a full toss. Drives down the ground to long on
items.shortText: Shadab Khan to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: full just outside off, and he defends. But the ball takes an outside edge, and flies past the keeper's right to third man
items.shortText: Shadab Khan to Mohammad Mithun, 2 runs

items.text: good length, but wide outside off. The ball's spinning inwards, and he punches this off the back foot to the bowler
items.shortText: Shadab Khan to Mohammad Mithun, no run

items.text: extra rip on this delivery. Lands full outside off, and he drives this against the spin to mid off. Can't pinch the single
items.shortText: Shadab Khan to Mohammad Mithun, no run

items.text: full on middle stump. No grip off the surface so far, and tapped off the front foot. The ball rolls back to Nawaz
items.shortText: Mohammad Nawaz to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: full on middle stump, and he whips this off his pads to square leg for a single. Uses his wrists to place this behind square
items.shortText: Mohammad Nawaz to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: full just outside off, and he pushes this down the ground, but the ball takes an outside edge and runs away to deep point. The slowness allows them to come back for the second
items.shortText: Mohammad Nawaz to Mohammad Mithun, 2 runs

items.text: back of a length outside off, and he punches this off the back foot to mid off
items.shortText: Mohammad Nawaz to Mohammad Mithun, no run

items.text: full just outside off, and he takes a big stride forward to defend. The ball rolls back to Nawaz
items.shortText: Mohammad Nawaz to Mohammad Mithun, no run

items.text: full on off stump, and he pushes this down the ground to long off
items.shortText: Mohammad Nawaz to Mohammad Mithun, 1 run

items.text: full just outside off, and the legbreak is pushed past the bowler's left to long off
items.shortText: Shadab Khan to Mohammad Mithun, 1 run

items.text: full on off stump, and he takes a huge stride forward. Then taps it with soft hands towards the leg side
items.shortText: Shadab Khan to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: fuller outside off, and this time he can free his arms. Crunches a slap past the fielder at cover for a single
items.shortText: Shadab Khan to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: full just outside off, and expectedly spinning into the batsman. Defended towards cover
items.shortText: Shadab Khan to Mohammad Mithun, no run

items.text: full and wide outside off, and this time he drives through the ball's line to wide long off
items.shortText: Shadab Khan to Mohammad Mithun, 1 run

items.text: back of a length outside off, and he rocks back to cut this square to Shaheen at deep point. A good diving effort ensures it's not a boundary.
items.shortText: Shadab Khan to Mushfiqur Rahim, 2 runs

items.preText: Thanks, Sreshth. These two have put on 71 now. Nawaz from left-arm round.
items.text: looks to sweep, and that's dangerous, given that this ball starts within the line of the stumps, and there's a polite lbw appeal from the bowler - didn't straighten that much, and would probably have missed leg stump. Hawkeye would have returned an umpire's call verdict anyway, clipping the outside of leg stump
items.shortText: Mohammad Nawaz to Mohammad Mithun, no run

items.text: slower, goes deep in his crease to nudge it gently to the right of midwicket
items.shortText: Mohammad Nawaz to Mohammad Mithun, 1 run

items.text: full, angling down leg, and Mushfiq tickles it away nicely to the right of short fine leg
items.shortText: Mohammad Nawaz to Mushfiqur Rahim, 2 leg byes

items.text: length ball sliding in towards middle stump, and that's another nicely taken single - just a gentle push into the leg side, and Imam is right on the edge of the circle at midwicket
items.shortText: Mohammad Nawaz to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run
